column4: hey, quick question, i'm running gutsy, but this also happened on feisty, every so often audio players will randomly seg fault for no apparent reason, all audio player seem to do it... has anybody got any ideas of how to sort this?
all your audio players do it and have done it on both feisty and now gutsy?
is it unique to ubuntu or all distros
don't have any other distros to try i'm afraid
